title: Bug 49241DataSourceFactory.parsePoolProperties() doesn't look for "suspectTimeout"
OB: If you call the DataSourceFactory.parsePoolProperties() method, passing in a Properties object with the "suspectTimeout" property set, that key/value pair is never passed on to the PoolProperties.setSuspectTimeout() method.
SR: If you call the DataSourceFactory.parsePoolProperties() method, passing in a Properties object with the "suspectTimeout" property set, that key/value pair is never passed on to the PoolProperties.setSuspectTimeout() method.
